attributes.action: Jail the MP's with false claims like any other person would be in a 9-5 job, the bottom line is they comitted fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If joe blogs off the street took in £1000's of expenses that should not have been paid it would be fraud and they would be jailed

why arn't these MP's?

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
